title: Nice and quite Studio in Bastille - Paris
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Studio 35 m2 (376 ft2) in 11th Arrondissement (just in front of a metro station, 5min from Place de la Bastille, 5min from le Marais and 7min from Republique on foot) in a calm apartment block.
*4th floor with elevator.
*Furnished main room with bay window, double bed, couch and several chairs, cabled flat screen TV and WIFI, free local telephone usage.
*Equipped kitchen room (cooking plates, microwave oven, refrigirator).
*Bathroom fitted with bathtub and toilets.
*Balcony.
*Central heating.
Supermarket at 1min on foot, coin laundry at 1min on foot.
Non smoking studio!
2 people maximum.
Available from April 10th to September 11th.
210€/week - 770€/month.
